# model

**Instance Property**

The underlying Core ML model of the text classifier.

## Declaration

```swift
var model: MLModel { get set }
```

## Describing a text classifier

- **description**: A text representation of the text classifier.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the text classifier that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the text classifier in a playground.
